grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 核【カク】stone (of a fruit), pit, pip, core (of an organization, team, etc.), nucleus, heart, nuclear weapons, nucleus (of an atom), nucleus (of a cell), condensation nucleus, (planetary) core, ring (in a cyclic compound), kernel, core, nucleus (of a cultured pearl)
核家族【カクカゾク】nuclear family
中核【チュウカク】kernel, core, nucleus, center, centre
放射性同位核【ホウシャセイドウイカク】radioisotope
